#### Tender Details

##### Description of Requirement

Shared Services Canada (SSC) requires a supply of replacement batteries for Uninterruptible Power Supplies (UPS) meeting the following specifications:

*   Rack-mounted single-phase UPS with a capacity of 5kVA or greater
*   Rack-mounted three-phase UPS with a capacity of 5kVA or greater
*   Standalone single-phase UPS with a capacity of 5kVA or greater
*   Standalone three-phase UPS with a capacity of 5kVA or greater

These replacement batteries are required for federal government sites across Canada on an as-and-when requested basis for SSC and its associated organizations.

In addition to the delivery of UPS replacement batteries, suppliers may be required to provide installation and recycling services for used UPS batteries.

##### Procurement Process

This Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) is intended to invite original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and OEM-approved resellers to prequalify their business through this solicitation. Suppliers that meet the mandatory requirements will be qualified for opportunities to supply Canada with UPS replacement batteries.

The procurement process aims to be inclusive, providing access to a broad range of suppliers across Canada, including indigenous and non-indigenous businesses.

This RFSA is divided into two streams:

1.  RFSA with a partial indigenous set-aside for the provision of UPS replacement batteries in Canadian provinces (BPM020539-A).
2.  Indigenous business set-aside RFSA for the provision of UPS replacement batteries in Canadian territories (BPM020539-B).

The resulting Supply Arrangements will be used to establish a list of qualified suppliers, standardize resulting contracts, and streamline future solicitations, responses, and invoicing processes.
